betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Decay Warehouse stores a single type of radioactive isotope and allows it to decay over time. 

The decay speed of the isotope is §adependent§r on its half-life.

Isotopes will decay §9regardless§r of whether the warehouse is on or powered. 

The Warehouse's capacity equals the chest's capacity divided by §c400§r.

Capacity of the multiblock for each chest:

§6Super Chest I:§r §c10,000
§6Super Chest II:§r §c20,000
§6Super Chest III:§r §c40,000
§6Super Chest IV:§r §c80,000
§6Super Chest V:§r §c160,000
§6Quantum Chest I:§r §c320,000
§6Quantum Chest II:§r §c640,000
§6Quantum Chest III:§r §c1,280,000
§6Quantum Chest IV:§r §c2,560,000
§6Quantum Chest V:§r §c5,368,000§r

[note]Right click the controller with a §aScrewdriver§r to dump stored isotopes into an output bus.

Right click the controller with a §aPlunger§r to empty it. [/note]

[warn]The Warehouse's contents are §nvoided§r when the controller is broken[/warn]
